title: Inside Out 2
genre: Adventure, Animation, Comedy, Drama, Family, Fantasy
actors: Amy Poehler, Maya Hawke, Kensington Tallman, Liza Lapira
plot: Riley enters puberty and a new emotion—Anxiety—emerges inside her mind as she navigates teenage life.
awards: Nominated: Golden Globe, Critics' Choice, BAFTA, Academy Award for Best Animated Feature

title: Deadpool & Wolverine
writer: Shawn Levy, Ryan Reynolds, Rhett Reese, Paul Wernick, Zeb Wells
actors: Ryan Reynolds, Hugh Jackman, Emma Corrin, Matthew Macfadyen
plot: Deadpool must recruit a variant of Wolverine from the multiverse to save his universe, blending humor, action and meta‑jokes.

title: Despicable Me 4
actors: Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig, Joey King, Miranda Cosgrove, Stephen Colbert, Sofía Vergara, Will Ferrell
plot: Gru and his family return for a new adventure filled with Minions, laughs and heart.

title: Moana 2
genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical
director: David Derrick Jr., Jason Hand, Dana Ledoux Miller
plot: Three years after her first voyage, Moana and Maui assemble a crew to find the lost island of Motufetu, break its curse and reconnect with their ocean people.
awards: Nominated: Golden Globe Best Animated Feature

title: Dune: Part Two
actors: Timothée Chalamet, Zendaya, Rebecca Ferguson, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin
plot: Paul Atreides unites with the Fremen for revenge and control of Arrakis while balancing love and destiny.
awards: Won: 2 BAFTAs, 2 Oscars; Nominated: Golden Globes, Critics' Choice, Academy Awards (5 noms.)
